text: I am looking for the `unfoldr` function - I found this <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/julia-equivalence-of-haskells-unfoldr/17834> but maybe it never got added?

attachments.title: Julia equivalence of Haskells unfoldr
attachments.text: Might be a stupid question but I know julia has the foldl and foldr functions but I cannot find the unfold versions. For example in Haskell we have the unfoldr function which produces a list based on an initial value. Does julia have an equivalent function for this? I tried searching for it but nothing useful came up.
attachments.fallback: JuliaLang: Julia equivalence of Haskells unfoldr

elements.text: but maybe it never got added?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
